author: Staff Reporter
text:
A laptop and Rs. 45,000 were stolen from a car on Muthamizh Nagar in Pammal early this week in the city.

Police personnel said that Giridharan (45), an eatery owner had parked his car in front of his house on Parthasarathi Street.

The miscreants damaged

the windows of the vehicle and stole the laptop and cash.

In another incident in the city, jewellery weighing eight sovereigns was stolen from a house at Taramani two days ago.

Dilli (38), a snack seller, had locked his house on Erikkarai Street and left for work.

When the snack owner returned in the evening, he found the doors of his house broken open and the jewels missing. He has lodged a complaint with the police. Investigations are on — Staff Reporter
title: Laptop, cash stolen from car
